sub_fields.label: Project Grid Image
sub_fields.name: project_grid_image
sub_fields.instructions: All Images should be approximately the same size.

sub_fields.label: Drop Down Content
sub_fields.name: fancy_bullet_points_picAndText_repeater_dropDownContent
sub_fields.instructions: This is the text that will be shown when menu is opened

sub_fields.label: Small Image
sub_fields.name: small_image
sub_fields.instructions: This image will appear second if equal sized images is checked

sub_fields.label: Equal sized images
sub_fields.name: is_equal_sized
sub_fields.instructions: If this true, both images will appear the same size with larger image appering first

sub_fields.label: Float right
sub_fields.name: should_float_right
sub_fields.instructions: If this is selected the larger image will appear to the right

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: pop_out_image
sub_fields.instructions: Remember this will expand so choose images with enough res to handle this. Vertical images work better then horozontal

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: popOut_content
sub_fields.instructions: Keep this really short and don't get fancy

sub_fields.label: image
sub_fields.name: linked_image
sub_fields.instructions: Must be square and the same size as other images added
